ComicInfo.Title: Battle Royale
ComicInfo.Summary: The Winged Monkeys finally see the need in helping the Freedom Fighters, but then become pawns of the Nome King when he reveals he has the missing Monkey Cap which magically controls their allegiance. In a great finale battle, all of the players from the previous issues meet to decide the fate of Oz, once and for all! Based on the Wonderful Wizard of Oz books.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev57 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-09 18:20:02. [Issue ID 41918]
